entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 06:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
